dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will openly and intensely show their emotions, sometimes to the point of being overwhelming.
Your FarTwin will keep their emotions private, rarely sharing them with others unless absolutely necessary.

dimensions.label: Social Interactions
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with strangers?

options.description: Your FarTwin will eagerly engage with new people, often taking the lead in conversations and social situations.
Your FarTwin will prefer to interact with familiar people or have time alone, avoiding large groups or unfamiliar individuals.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new experiences?

options.description: Your FarTwin will pursue novel and potentially hazardous activities with enthusiasm, enjoying the rush of adrenaline.
Your FarTwin will carefully weigh risks before engaging in new experiences, preferring a more controlled approach.

dimensions.label: Decision-Making
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin make decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely on instinct and immediate gut feelings to guide their decision-making process.
Your FarTwin will carefully analyze data, weigh options, and consider multiple perspectives before making a decision.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle disagreements?

options.description: Your FarTwin will engage in friendly, competitive conflicts to resolve issues, often seeking to 'win' the argument.
Your FarTwin will seek mutual understanding and compromise with others to find a resolution that satisfies both parties.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach learning new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prefer hands-on, experiential learning, actively engaging with the material to solidify understanding.
Your FarTwin will focus on abstract concepts and theoretical frameworks, often analyzing and discussing ideas in depth.

dimensions.label: Time Management
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize tasks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will concentrate on a single task, allocating specific time slots to complete it efficiently.
Your FarTwin will adapt to changing circumstances and priorities, adjusting their schedule as needed.

dimensions.label: Creative Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express creativity?

options.description: Your FarTwin will fully immerse themselves in creative activities, often losing track of time and reality.
Your FarTwin will approach creativity with a logical, analytical mindset, examining and refining their work before presenting it.
